mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO (USERINFO_SEQ, USERINFO_CONTROLNO, USERINFO_NAME, USERINFO_NICKNAME, USERINFO_ID, USERINFO_PASSWORD, USERINFO_SEX, USERINFO_AGE, USERINFO_PHONNUMBER, USERINFO_EMAIL) VALUES(USERINFOSEQ.NEXTVAL,'#{dto.userinfo_controlno}','#{dto.userinfo_name}','#{dto.userinfo_nickname}','#{dto.userinfo_id}','#{dto.userinfo_password}','#{dto.userinfo_sex}','#{dto.userinfo_age}','#{dto.userinfo_phonnumber}','#{dto.userinfo_email}');
